net.sqlcipher.database

Class SQLiteContentHelper

extends java.lang.Object
    Some helper functions for using SQLite database to implement content providers.

    • Method Detail

      • getBlobColumnAsAssetFile

        public static AssetFileDescriptor getBlobColumnAsAssetFile(SQLiteDatabase db,
                                                           java.lang.String sql,
                                                           java.lang.String[] selectionArgs)
                                                    throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Runs an SQLite query and returns an AssetFileDescriptor for the blob in column 0 of the first row. If the first column does not contain a blob, an unspecified exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        db - Handle to a readable database.
        sql - SQL query, possibly with query arguments.
        selectionArgs - Query argument values, or null for no argument.
        Returns:
        If no exception is thrown, a non-null AssetFileDescriptor is returned.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the query returns no results or the value of column 0 is NULL, or if there is an error creating the asset file descriptor.
